---
title: "FILES"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
#| echo: false

# LECTURES
fs = list.files("lectures/",".html")
knitr::kable(data.frame(slide_decks = 
                          unlist(lapply(fs, function(x) 
                            paste0('<a href="lectures/',x,'">',x,'</a>')))
                        ))

# LABS
fs = list.files("labs/",".html")
knitr::kable(data.frame(labs = 
                          unlist(lapply(fs, function(x) 
                            paste0('<a href="labs/',x,'">',x,'</a>')))
                        ))

```
